name: Unguaranteed _Senior_Security level - No detailed information available
description: In case of unguaranteed securities, there are no obligations to guarantors to make payments to the holder of the security if the issuer fails to meet the obligation to make repayments arising under the instrument secured by the guarantor. Senior securities are required to be repaid before subordinated securities. To be reported, in case the security level (secured/usecured) is not available / applicable.
